name: Men's 'Outlaw' Pants (Sansha's Nation)
description:
Designer: Unknown

Straight from the discreet consignments of Intaki Commerce, these pants indicate that the wearer is a true supporter of the Sansha cause. Each pair of pants is richly detailed, with olive camouflage fabric and dark green accents. When paired with the matching Sansha's Nation Jacket these pants present a stunning visual motif.
